Detailed Description

MatlabMatrix class.

Encapsulation of Matlab matrices : the matrix is adapted from the Matlab command window

MatlabMatrix::MatlabMatrix ( String  Name,
String  Site,
int_T  nbl,
int_T  nbc,
real_T  valini 
) [inline]

If a similar matrix (same name, same site and same sizes) exists, the constructor will copy the existing matrix adress.

Otherwise, the matrix is created and initialised with the value

Parameters:
Name,: name of the matrix
Site,: "base" designs Matlab workspace
nbl,: number of lines
nbc,: number of columns
valini,: initial value
